cn.sharesdk.demo

Class MainAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • MenuAdapter
      • cn.sharesdk.demo.MainAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlatformActionListener

    public class MainAdapter
extends MenuAdapter
implements PlatformActionListener
    Adapter of sliding menu, handles ui events of sliding menu
